Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: choonki quraish ko jaade aur garmee ke safar se maanoos kar diya hai
to unako maanoos kar dene kee vajah se
is ghar (kaaba) ke maalik kee ibaadat karanee chaahie
jisane unako bhookh mein khaana diya aur unako khauf se aman ata kiya
